00022 #include "circuit.h"
00023 #include <iostream>
00024 #include <fstream>
00025 #include "dot.h"
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 
00029 void CircuitGraphPrint () 
00030 {
00031     Wire* curWire;
00032     Gate* curGate;
00033     int level = 0;
00034     map<string,Wire*>::iterator iter;
00035     list<Element*>::iterator innerIter;
00036     multimap<int,Element*>:: iterator levelIter;
00037 
00038     ofstream graphFile;
00039     graphFile.open("trial.dot");
00040    
00041 
00042     // Print .dot header
00043     graphFile << "digraph ckt { \n";
00044     graphFile <<  "rankdir = LR;\n";
00045 
00046     //Set the common properties for each node
00047     graphFile << "node [label=\"\" style=filled fixedsize=true width=1.6 height=1.6];\n";
00048 
00049     // define all the wire nodes
00050     iter =  (circuit.Netlist).begin();
00051     for (;iter != (circuit.Netlist).end(); iter++)
00052     {
00053         curWire = iter->second;
00054         graphFile << "node [label = " << curWire->id << " " << curWire->value <<  "  shape = circle ];  " << curWire->id <<  ";\n";
00055     }
00056 
00057 
00058     
00059     // define all the gate nodes
00060     do
00061     {
00062         for (levelIter = ((circuit.Levels).equal_range(level)).first; 
00063                 levelIter !=((circuit.Levels).equal_range(level)).second; levelIter++)
00064         {
00065             if ( (levelIter->second)->type == GATE)
00066             {
00067                 curGate =  dynamic_cast<Gate*> (levelIter->second);
00068                 string name = (curGate->id);
00069 
00070                 graphFile << "node [label = " << name <<  " shape = record ];  " << curGate->id <<  "  ;\n";
00071             }
00072         }
00073     }while ((circuit.Levels).find(++level) != (circuit.Levels).end()); 
00074 
00075 
00076     
00077     // Logic: For every wire in the circuit, print its output
00078     // If the wire's input is a Gate, then print that connection
00079     // i.e gate going to that wire
00080     iter =  (circuit.Netlist).begin();
00081     for (;iter != (circuit.Netlist).end(); iter++)
00082     {
00083         curWire = iter->second;
00084        
00085         // First print the input if needed
00086         if ( curWire->input && curWire->input->type == GATE)
00087             graphFile <<  (curWire->input->id) << "->" <<  ( curWire->id) << ";" << endl;
00088 
00089 
00090         // Take care of outputs now
00091         innerIter = curWire->outputs.begin();
00092         for ( ;innerIter != curWire->outputs.end();innerIter++)
00093             graphFile <<  (curWire->id) << "->" <<  ((*innerIter)->id) << ";" << endl;
00094            
00095     }
00096  
00097     // End the graph printing routine 
00098     graphFile << " \n } \n";
00099     graphFile.close();
00100 }
